terms.description: A powerful technique that allows the user to manipulate karma and has the potential to kill enemies while returning the karma to the user.
A sword technique that is part of Jiang Zhiwei's skill set. It is known for its precision and lethality.
A figure mentioned in the context of Mo Wuji's cultivation journey. He is a notable character in the story.
A coffin used to suppress the Heavenly Way Monster, preventing it from wreaking havoc. It is tied to the Wang family's history and the consequences of their past actions.
A mystical palace that serves as a significant location in the story. It is associated with powerful artifacts and the secrets of the martial world.
A mystical flower that grows in the Carefree Valley, known for its properties that can help one forget their sorrows and past reincarnations. It is a key ingredient in the Draught of Fading Misery.
A sword technique used by Xiao Zhenhai, known for its incredible speed. It is a formidable skill that can overwhelm opponents.
A legendary sword style that is said to be incredibly powerful and is associated with the character Xiao Meng. It represents the pinnacle of swordsmanship in the story.
The Buddha of Medicine, a significant figure in Buddhism who is associated with healing and medicine. He is also linked to the Qing Emperor and plays a role in Meng Qi's journey.
An elixir with healing properties that can heal most injuries in an hour. It is valuable for cultivators in need of recovery.
A notorious horse bandit leader known for his ruthlessness and cunning. He commands a significant number of followers.
A divine weapon associated with the teachings of Buddhism. It is a significant artifact that is sought after by various factions.
An organization known for its evil practices and connection to the demonic forces. They are a significant antagonist group in the story, often clashing with the protagonists.
A powerful item used by the Oracle of the Covenant, capable of refining divine weapons. It is a crucial asset in the conflict against the Ruan clan.
A manifestation of a powerful entity that can influence the actions of others. It is associated with the dark and sinister aspects of the story.

A group known for their ability to manipulate water, they are formidable opponents who can pose a threat to those beneath the level of grandmaster. Their lineage is tied to ancient powers and they are often involved in conflicts with other factions.
A member of the Immortals, known for her strength and wisdom. She plays a crucial role in guiding Meng Qi and his companions during their mission.
A part of the Shaolin Temple dedicated to the study of Buddhism and Zen. It is where monks learn the teachings of Buddha and practice meditation.
A revered figure in the story, representing enlightenment and compassion. The various Buddhas mentioned have significant influence over the events and characters in the narrative.
A character who is a monk from the Merriment Temple and possesses the Mind Connection Bead, allowing him to read the thoughts of others.
A Maha Bodhisattva and trusted guard of Bhaisajyaguru. He plays a crucial role in Meng Qi's quest and helps him navigate the complexities of the Middle Ages.
A powerful artifact that can dispel evil spirits and protect its wielder. It plays a significant role in Meng Qi's battles against demons.
A powerful item that can dispel evil spirits and protect its wielder. It is crucial for Mo Wuji in his encounters with dark forces.
A legendary location believed to hold great secrets and treasures, including the possibility of the Netherworld being sealed within. It is central to the plot and the characters' quests.
A prominent figure in the story, known for his wisdom and power. He is associated with the Hollow Jade Temple and plays a significant role in the events unfolding.
A river that flows through the Celestial Court, significant for its connection to the realm of the Immortals. It is also the setting for various events and encounters.
A puppet that embodies the swordsmanship of the Awakening Celestial Sword. It serves as a vessel for Meng Qi to explore and leave a marking in the world.
A mysterious figure mentioned in connection with the events surrounding Jiang Tabo’s death. His identity and motives are shrouded in secrecy.
The emperor's concubine who is suspected of being involved in the emperor's sudden death. She is described as having a lack of skill in pleasing the emperor.
One of the Seven Great Demons, known for its ability to control the dead and turn them into zombies. It is a formidable opponent that the heroes must confront.
A powerful entity that can be used to enhance one's abilities. The Nether Emperor seeks to use it to achieve greater power.
A member of the Myths who is known for his cunning and strength. He plays a significant role in the events surrounding Qu Jiuniang.
A character who is a demon and ranked seventh on the Black List. He possesses powerful abilities and is known for his ruthless nature.
Another powerful family, this one from Pingjin, that is involved in the political machinations of the Great Jin Dynasty. They are also suspected of colluding with the North Zhou Empire.
The Castellan of Destiny City and a grandmaster in martial arts. He is known for his stern demeanor and is involved in the investigation of the Ennea Monkey's activities.
A concept related to the essence of the Dao that cultivators seek to understand and harness. It is often associated with the creation of new laws.
A seal that represents the principles of karma and is crucial for Meng Qi's cultivation. It allows him to manipulate the connections between past and present.
A special type of law that Mo Wuji seeks to understand and cultivate. It is associated with the darker aspects of cultivation.
A dangerous area surrounding Yanling Island, known for its ability to trap and weaken those who enter. It is a significant obstacle for the forces of the Great Zhou.
An organization that specializes in stratagem techniques and is one of the dominant powers in the region. They have a significant influence over the events in the story.
A powerful entity associated with the Life-and-Death Fugacity Sect. It is suggested that she has the ability to manipulate life and death.
Another legendary weapon that is sought after in the story. It is associated with the Hao Yue Clan and has significant power.
A legendary figure in the story, known for his immense power and influence. His relics are highly sought after and play a significant role in the plot.
A character known for her cunning and manipulative nature. She has a complex relationship with Meng Qi and plays a significant role in the unfolding events.
Crystals formed from the Devil Qi of demons. They are essential for the heroes to complete their mission of sealing the Demonic World channel.
A prosperous city known for its bustling trade and martial arts culture. It is the setting for many events in the story, including the duel between grandmasters.
A powerful figure who is both the Devil Buddha and the God of Thunder. He is a major antagonist who seeks to control Meng Qi and has a complex history involving the fall of the Heavenly Court.
A divine weapon that Meng Qi possesses, it is capable of unleashing powerful attacks and is crucial in his confrontations with enemies.
A title held by Yang Zhenchan, a character who is a formidable opponent and has a history of violence. He is sought after by the protagonists.
A character who is a Dharmakaya master and plays a significant role in the events surrounding the Ninth Heaven remnants. He is a formidable opponent.
A powerful technique that allows its practitioner to manipulate the laws of reality. It is sought after by many characters in the story.
A precious item used in cultivation and forging of weapons. It is highly sought after by cultivators for its unique properties.
A structure within Zhenwu’s mausoleum that seems to suppress something. Its presence adds to the mystery of the grave.
A rare and valuable fruit that can be consumed or used to concoct a powerful pill. It is sought after by cultivators for its ability to help them advance in their cultivation.
A Tier 8 immortal pill used for disguise, allowing the user to alter their appearance temporarily. It is considered valuable and effective in the Immortal World.
Also known as Mr. Leisure, he is one of the Seven Grandmasters and the father of Duan Mingcheng. He seeks help to find his missing son.
A significant location for the Cao clan, it is known for its mystical properties and is the site of a hidden treasury. The lake is associated with the cultivation of powerful techniques.
A source of pure yang water used in various cultivation techniques, particularly beneficial for enhancing the strength of practitioners.
A powerful palm technique used by Zu Wenzhong, one of the notable figures in the story. It is known for its lethal capabilities.
An ancient and powerful entity associated with the Netherworld, believed to have been sealed away. The characters are concerned about his potential return.
A legendary weapon that has the power to defeat demons and fairies. It is wielded by Gao Lan and is a symbol of his authority.
A powerful entity associated with Evil Spirit Cultivation, capable of resurrection and causing chaos. It poses a significant threat to cultivators and is a central focus of the conflict in the story.
A Refined Weapon that is exceptionally sharp and capable of cutting through most defenses. It is imbued with the essence of thunder, making it a formidable weapon.
A notorious figure in Jianghu, known for his cunning and ruthlessness. He is a master of the Immortal Pressing Art and poses a significant threat to others.
A location associated with the horse bandits and the Crying Elder. It is a dangerous area where many conflicts occur.
An order issued by Ze Luoju to hunt down specific targets, particularly those who have offended him or his gang.
A dangerous body of water in the Celestial Court that can strip a person of their powers. It is a place where many immortals and deities have met their demise.
An ancient artifact that is crucial for sealing the Demonic World channel. It is sought after by both the heroes and the demons.
The general director in charge of palace affairs who mysteriously disappears after the emperor's death. His disappearance is a key point in the investigation.
Another of the Seven Great Demons, characterized by its fiery nature and destructive powers. It is a dangerous foe that Meng Qi and his companions must defeat.
A renowned blade technique practiced by Qing Yu, the heir of the Xuan Tian Sect. It is known for its speed and elegance.
A powerful martial art associated with the God-gathering Heights. It is known for its ability to harness the power of thunder and lightning in combat.
A supreme martial art in the Shaolin Temple, derived from The Buddha’s Palm. It requires a strong mind and is known for its difficulty in practice.
An inn in Maoling where Jiang Tabo was last seen. It is significant as it connects to the investigation of his death.
A revered monk known for his wisdom and ability to mediate conflicts. He is a significant figure in the story.
A technique used by He Jiu that allows him to manipulate sword energy in an elusive manner. It is a formidable skill that poses a significant challenge to opponents.
Another of the Premier Nine Seals, it represents the four elements and is essential for Meng Qi's martial arts development. It is linked to the concepts of creation and destruction.

terms.term: Four Villains of the Zheng Family
terms.description: A notorious group known for their ruthless tactics and martial prowess. They are involved in the political intrigue surrounding the imperial court.
A nine-fingered master of the Blue-blooded People, he is a formidable opponent who possesses the ability to manipulate water and is involved in the conflict with the Ruan clan.
A significant location where cultivators gather to seek treasures and opportunities. It is currently undergoing an incubation process that causes chaotic fluctuations in the laws of Heaven and Earth.
A high-level cultivator who possesses significant power. They are mentioned in the context of the God Domain Nest.

terms.term: God-trapping Formation of the Five Elements
terms.description: A powerful formation that has been inverted, leading to the current chaos in Bomi. It is tied to the entrance of the Carefree Valley.
A defensive technique in the Shaolin Temple that protects the practitioner from harm. It is one of the foundational techniques that Zhen Ding is learning.
A powerful sect known for its ability to forge Heavenly Weapons. It plays a significant role in the story as Meng Qi seeks their help.
Another Tier 3 spiritual herb that Mo Wuji needs for the Spirit Strengthening Pill. It is considered rare and valuable.
An island that is part of the Fairy World, known for its powerful members and connections to the Golden Turtle Island's ambassador. It plays a significant role in the story's unfolding events.
A powerful energy that cultivators yearn for. It is associated with the creation and understanding of the Dao.
Another name for Sun Wukong, a legendary figure known for his immense strength and abilities. He is a significant character in the story, often representing rebellion and freedom.

A Half-step Exterior Scenery master known for his strength and sinister abilities. He is one of the guardians of the Moon Village and is involved in the conflict surrounding the God-gathering Heights.
The Siren of Daluo, known for her beauty and cunning. She has a complex relationship with Meng Qi, and her actions are driven by her desire for power and revenge.
A legendary artifact that can immobilize enemies and is associated with the God of Thunder. Its core fragment is sought after for its immense power and significance.
A master of the Eastsea Sword Village and the first-ranked individual on the Ranking List of Young Masters. He is known for his exceptional swordsmanship and is hosting the Party of Happycloud.
Known as 'Sword Maniac', he is a Peerless Master Pro and a key figure in the Eastsea Sword Village. He is characterized by his strong determination and skill in swordsmanship.
A legendary figure whose corpse is found in the Life-and-Death Fugacity Sect. He is known for his wisdom and is a significant character in the history of the world.
A legendary location associated with Buddhist Monk Jiuzhen. It is believed to contain powerful artifacts and is a target for the heroes' mission.
A powerful bell that can disrupt the consciousness of those who hear it, used by Bi Chongde to incapacitate his enemies.
A powerful technique created by the ancient Thunder God, known for its ability to integrate the essence of moves into the blade. It is highly sought after by cultivators.
A technique that allows Mo Wuji to move quickly and evade danger. It showcases his agility and speed in combat.
A long saber wielded by Meng Qi, known for its immense power and ability to unleash devastating attacks. It plays a key role in his battles.
A title held by Han Guang, representing his authority and power within the Celestial Court. He is a significant character in the story.
A temple that has transformed into a sect under the leadership of Heaven-destined Cultivator. It is a place of worship and spiritual guidance.
An ancient realm that was once the seat of power for many celestial beings. Its collapse marked a significant turning point in the story's history.
A powerful figure who ruled over the heavens and is associated with the establishment of the Heavenly Court. His influence is felt throughout the story.
A cultivation stage that denotes a high level of power among cultivators. Those at this stage possess significant abilities and influence.
A skill that allows its user to perceive the world around them and gain insights into the nature of reality. It is a powerful technique that enhances one's understanding of the Dao.
A legendary figure in the story, associated with the Immortal World. His name is invoked in discussions about powerful beings and their influence.
An organization that Mo Wuji is associated with. It serves as a base for cultivators and is involved in the events surrounding the God Domain Nest.
An advanced martial art practiced by the God-gathering Heights, focusing on spear techniques. It is one of the key skills that the characters aim to master.

A title representing a powerful figure within the Immortals, often associated with wisdom and authority. The character wearing the mask of Heavenly Primogenitor is a mysterious and formidable presence.
A location within the story that serves as a prison for ancient gods and powerful beings. It is a place of great significance and danger.
An organization that oversees the operations and order of the Heavenly River. It plays a role in maintaining the balance of power in the celestial realm.
A mystical location that can move and is home to various demons. It is known for its beauty and the challenges it presents to cultivators.
A type of warrior in the Celestial Court, known for their strength and combat prowess. They are depicted as formidable foes that can pose a significant threat to cultivators.

A terrifying entity that emerges from the slough of a Dharmakaya who has passed away while sitting cross-legged. It represents the dark side of the Wang family's legacy and the consequences of their practices.
A powerful type of weapon that can significantly enhance a cultivator's abilities. Hasula possesses one, which he uses in battle.
A sacred weapon used by Chu Zhuangwang. It has the ability to bind and control others, making it a formidable tool in battle.
A monstrous creature allied with the Thunder God. It possesses acute senses and is a formidable opponent in battle.
A prominent sect in the story, known for its martial arts and teachings. It has a significant influence in the region and is involved in the conflicts surrounding the characters.
A Tier 3 spiritual herb used in pill refining. It is one of the ingredients Mo Wuji needs to create the Spirit Strengthening Pill.
A legendary figure known for his powerful artifacts and connections to the divine. He plays a role in the story's exploration of ancient powers and their influence.
A member of the Immortals who assists Meng Qi. He possesses great wisdom and knowledge of the events surrounding the Buddha's Palm.
Another concubine of the emperor who feels threatened by Concubine Mei. She believes that Concubine Mei is responsible for the emperor's death.
The sacred ground of the current Dao sect, known for its rich history and powerful practitioners.
A significant location within the Nine Levels of Heaven, known for its treasures and the core fragment of the Hao Tian Mirror. It is a dangerous place filled with powerful remnants of the past.
A prominent family in the story, known for their connections and influence. Their Young Lad holds important information regarding the peace negotiations.
A skilled swordswoman from the Sword Washing Pavilion, known for her exceptional swordsmanship. She is one of Meng Qi's companions and plays a significant role in their battles.
A character who has gone missing and is the subject of a search. His disappearance is linked to the Shen family and the unfolding events in the story.
A technique associated with the Lanke Temple that allows the user to perceive and interact with the world in a unique way.
A powerful seal that is one of the Premier Nine Seals. It is associated with the Pangu Flag and is crucial for Meng Qi's cultivation and understanding of martial arts.
A formation that embodies the principles of karma. It is a significant technique that Meng Qi encounters during his journey.
Zhao Jingshi, the King of Qin, who is involved in the political intrigue following the emperor's death. He is a key figure in the power dynamics of the Great Jin Dynasty.
A sacred text that can help in exorcising spirits and guiding lost souls. It is sought after by various characters in the story.
A temple that has become a site of hauntings and mysterious occurrences. It is the setting for many of the characters' encounters.
A cultivation technique related to the dark type law that Mo Wuji is interested in cultivating.
A Tier 3 spiritual herb that is also required for the Spirit Strengthening Pill. It is rare and difficult to find.
One of the nine evil sects in the story, known for its dark practices and manipulation of life and death. Its destruction marks a significant event in the narrative.
An organization known for its dark practices and ability to create powerful zombies. They are involved in the chaos surrounding the events in Maoling.
A deity that is worshipped by some characters in the story. She represents death and the cycle of life.
A record that ranks individuals based on their achievements and powers. It is a significant artifact in the story, influencing the fates of many characters.
A Tier 3 spiritual herb that is one of the ingredients needed for the Spirit Strengthening Pill. Mo Wuji is searching for it.
A general who has been summoned to the capital city. He is a key figure in the conflict against the West Invaders and is respected by many.
A prominent figure in Buddhism, representing wisdom and often depicted riding a lion. He is a powerful opponent that Meng Qi faces during his journey.
The protagonist of the story who has achieved Dharmakaya and possesses the Tyrant's Invincible Blade. He is on a journey to confront various powerful beings and uncover the secrets of his past.
An organization that has deviated from the teachings of Buddhism. It is involved in the events surrounding the Buddha's Palm and poses a threat to the protagonists.

The protagonist of the story, Mo Wuji is a determined cultivator who seeks to advance his skills and understanding of the world. He often finds himself in dangerous situations but uses his intelligence and resourcefulness to navigate challenges.
A supreme technique in the Shaolin Temple that enhances the physical capabilities of the practitioner. It is highly valued and closely guarded.
A cultivation stage that Mo Wuji is currently at, with his level rising due to the chaotic energy from the God Domain Nest.
A powerful entity who has been enhanced by the Corpse of Nether and seeks to capture powerful souls. He plays a significant role in the conflict.
Spirits that patrol the area of Bomi, often associated with death and the underworld. They are a source of danger for the characters.
A rare material used to forge weapons and artifacts. It is associated with the underworld and has unique properties.
A term referring to the highest level of the immortal world, where powerful beings and ancient gods reside. It is a significant location in the story.
A term related to the nine-headed Grand Sage, representing his connection to the primordial era and his legacy.
A realm associated with death and the underworld, where various evil beings and spirits reside.

terms.term: Nine twists of the Yellow River Formation
terms.description: A powerful formation known for its ability to trap and weaken cultivators. It is referenced as a formidable challenge for the forces attempting to conquer Yanling Island.
A powerful figure associated with the Xiangliu Clan, known for their abilities in the realm of demons.
A magical artifact that can draw the opponent's spirit into an illusory Samsara. It is used to inflict mental torment on enemies.
An ancient and powerful figure in the story, known for his strength and connection to the primordial era. His remains are sought after for their power.
A concept in the story referring to a manifestation of a being, often used in the context of the Successor of Mystic Fairy. It represents a physical form that can be used to interact with the world.
A technique used by Jiang Hengchuan that allows him to stabilize his attacks and counteract his opponent’s moves.
A powerful item that can be used to control water and create barriers. It is valuable for its ability to aid in combat and defense.
A master ranked 5th on the Black List, he is known for his cunning and powerful abilities. He seeks to obtain the Zither of Limbo during the conflict.
A significant event in Ying City where young masters gather to demonstrate their martial arts skills. It is a highly anticipated occasion that attracts many talented individuals.
An organization that Mo Wuji has offended, prompting him to disguise himself for safety.
A sect that has a long history and is known for its teachings and practices related to the ancient Qi Practitioners. They play a crucial role in the story.
The leader of the Immortals and a powerful Dharmakaya. He plays a crucial role in guiding Meng Qi and the other members.
A title held by Jia Zhen, who is a character associated with the Darkness Palace. He is involved in the events surrounding the Carefree Valley.
A concept that relates to the connections between actions and their consequences. It is fundamental to Meng Qi's understanding of his own fate and the fate of others.
A Precious Weapon wielded by the Ye family, known for its deadly power. It is a significant item in the conflict between the characters.
A member of the Huanhua Swords Sect, known for his stoic demeanor and mastery of the Book of the Chaos. He is one of Meng Qi's allies in their quest.
A character who is a maid and becomes entangled in the affairs of the Moon Village. She is the object of affection for Fair-faced Flying Dragon and is central to the conflict.
A powerful and cruel figure associated with the demonic forces. He is one of the antagonists that Meng Qi must confront during his journey.
A powerful artifact that contains the essence of the Wang family's ancestors and their connection to the afterlife. It is used to guide the spirits of the deceased and is tied to the family's legacy.
Another Half-step Exterior Scenery master and one of the guardians of the Moon Village. He is known for his powerful saber techniques and is a formidable opponent.
A powerful artifact associated with the concept of reincarnation. It plays a crucial role in the story's exploration of life, death, and rebirth.
An elder of the Ruan clan and a Peerless Master Pro, he is responsible for guarding the family and its treasures. He plays a crucial role in the clan's efforts against the Blue-blooded People.
The Magical Zither Godness from the Ruan family in Langya. She is a talented musician who uses her zither to influence battles and support her companions.
A powerful monk known for his mastery of Buddhist techniques. He is a formidable opponent and is often involved in significant conflicts.
A character known as the Kill-stopping Cultivator, who is a survivor of the Hao Yue Clan. She is powerful and has a mysterious aura.
A powerful weapon wielded by Gu Erduo, a character who is deeply connected to the events surrounding the Wang family. It symbolizes his strength and ambition.
A powerful artifact that governs the cycle of life and death, allowing its user to manipulate destiny and karma. It plays a crucial role in the story's themes of reincarnation and fate.
Another title held by Yang Zhenchan, indicating his past as a powerful and notorious figure. His reputation precedes him in the story.
A legendary item that is sought after by the Witch of the Black Mountain, believed to have the power to manipulate time and kill enemies invisibly.
Fragments of worlds that have been split apart. They are linked to the past and can influence the present and future.
An aristocratic family in Wen An known for their wealth and influence. They are involved in the human trafficking subplot and have connections to the main characters.

An organization that serves as a law enforcement body in the martial world, responsible for maintaining order and dealing with conflicts among cultivators. They play a crucial role in the story's events.
A title given to Yuan Mengzhi, indicating his prowess and reputation among the horse bandits.
The primary antagonist and a powerful demon that poses a significant threat to the world. He is the leader of the Seven Great Demons and seeks to awaken fully.
A powerful palmsmashing art that can turn the world upside down. It is a technique associated with the Heavenly Primogenitor.
A strategist who works with the Big Dangzi. He is known for his intelligence and cunning tactics.
Once the most powerful sect in the world, it has since fallen into decline. Its remnants are still sought after for their secrets and treasures.
A demon that can transform its body into various weapons. It is one of the Seven Great Demons and poses a significant challenge to the heroes.
A powerful weapon that has reached the level of Earth Fairy. It is wielded by Gu Xiaosang and is known for its destructive capabilities.
A primary spiritual will pill that increases the soul force of low-level cultivators. It is mentioned in the context of Mo Wuji's aspirations to advance his pill refining skills.
A Heavenly Weapon wielded by Hasula, known for its destructive power. It is capable of shooting arrows that can cause massive damage.
A legendary figure known for his unparalleled swordsmanship and mastery of the Sword Principles. He serves as a mentor figure to Meng Qi.
A powerful weapon that symbolizes authority and strength. It is a key item in the story, wielded by Gao Lan.
A significant location that houses powerful swords and is associated with the Sword-Enshrining Sect. It is a place of great importance in the martial arts world.
A powerful figure from the history of the Devil Claws, known for his tragic downfall and connection to the Demonic Monarch.
An aristocratic family in Yi City, known for its historical significance and internal power struggles. The family dynamics play a crucial role in the unfolding events.
Another secret organization that aims to achieve true immortality and detachment from Samsara. They are often in conflict with The Myths.
A secret organization that seeks to achieve immortality and detachment from Samsara. They are known for their powerful members and influence.
An assassin from the Unrelenting Tower, known for his ability to change his appearance and for his association with Evil Spirit Cultivation. He is a key antagonist in the story.
A group of powerful masters, including Taoist Baizhang, who are dedicated to fighting against the demons and protecting humanity.
A location in the Donghai region associated with the Plain Girl Sect. It is known for its connection to powerful figures and secrets.
A temple within the Celestial Court that holds significant importance. It is associated with the concept of life and death, and is a key location for the story's events.

terms.term: Thunder God from the Ninth Heaven
terms.description: A powerful character who is a member of the Myths. He possesses formidable lightning-based abilities and is a major antagonist.
A technique that allows the user to unleash a powerful sound wave capable of stunning opponents. It is effective in disrupting the focus of enemies.
A title given to Tong Yao, a powerful swordswoman who is known for her strength and skill in battle.
A powerful mantra associated with the Living Buddha Hotogtu, which allows him to manipulate the spiritual world and send opponents back to their past lives.
A supreme martial art that emphasizes the connection between the practitioner and the universe. It is divided into multiple layers, each with its own requirements.
A secret organization in Jianghu known for their ruthless methods and skilled fighters. They are involved in various criminal activities and have a notorious reputation.
A powerful Heavenly Weapon that Meng Qi wields, known for its ability to cut through karma and manipulate fate. It is a key element in Meng Qi's journey and battles.
A peak grade god material used to forge storage rings, which Mo Wuji identifies as valuable during his time in the God Domain Nest.
An ancient and powerful family in Jiangdong, known for their long history and connection to the Arithmetical Classic. They have a hidden sect and a legacy that includes many Dharmakayas.

The Grand Wang Prince of the Wang family from Jiangdong, known for his cunning and obsession with power. He has a history of using his family's legacy and knowledge to navigate the complexities of the martial world.
An elder who provides Mo Wuji with a face mask for disguise, indicating his concern for Mo Wuji's safety as he navigates the dangers of the God Domain Nest.
A technique that allows Mo Wuji to move rapidly, even outpacing some Heavenly God Stage experts. It showcases his agility and speed.
An antagonist in the story who is powerful and manipulative, seeking the Seven-Kill Tablet for her own purposes.
A powerful figure who is also an antagonist in the story. He possesses significant magical abilities and is involved in the conflicts against the protagonists.
The head of the Bodhi Yard in the Shaolin Temple, known for his wisdom and experience. He plays a significant role in the selection of disciples.
An ancient figure known for his strength and will. He is associated with the concept of resilience and survival in the face of adversity.
An elder monk in the Shaolin Temple who takes Zhen Ding and Zhen Hui as his disciples. He is knowledgeable and skilled in martial arts, particularly the Golden Bell Shield.
A powerful entity formed from the essence of the dark type law. It is a manifestation of the chaotic energy that arises from the Nine Nether.
A form of witchcraft that the emperor was obsessed with, leading to his sudden death. It involves absorbing the life force of others, which can have dangerous consequences.
A powerful figure and ambassador of Golden Turtle Island, who is a Divine Immortal. He plays a crucial role in the interactions between the characters and the unfolding plot.
A talisman used for communication and transportation, allowing the user to connect with others across distances.
A master of the horse bandits who has opened Nine Apertures. He is known for his cunning and strength.
A powerful entity or concept that represents the essence of creation and the universe. It is often invoked in discussions of martial arts and cultivation.
A powerful family in Long Nan that is involved in the political intrigue surrounding the emperor's death. They are suspected of having ulterior motives.
Also known as the Shocking Heaven and Earth, he is the fifth Imperial Prince of the Great Jin Dynasty. He possesses considerable strength and is a key ally in the fight against the demons.
A skilled monk from the Zhen generation who has recently broken through Bronzemen Lane and is known for his martial prowess. He is a prominent figure in the Shaolin Temple.
A young monk who has shown exceptional talent in martial arts, particularly in the Golden Bell Shield technique. He is also known for his cleverness and resourcefulness.
Zhen Ding's junior brother, who is kind-hearted and has a strong desire to learn martial arts. He has recently opened his Dantian and is training in the Flower-pinching Finger technique.
A martial arts inheritance that Meng Qi has acquired, which includes various techniques and skills. It is essential for his growth and understanding of martial arts.
A legendary figure known as the true martial emperor, who has immense power and is a key player in the conflicts of the story.
An ancient and powerful figure known for his strength and wisdom. He is associated with the legacy of the Zhenwu’s Decoy Grave.
A mysterious grave associated with the Zhenwu Great Emperor. It is believed to hold secrets and treasures related to his legacy.
The headquarters of the Sect of Six-Fans, where important decisions and discussions take place regarding the investigation into the emperor's death.
A divine weapon belonging to the Ruan clan, capable of producing powerful music that can influence the battlefield. It is sought after by various factions due to its immense power and significance.
